comment.body: @zozon yeah, i fixed it now. This only applies to people who visited before i posted this.
@anon112358 Thanks for the correction, should be fixed now. And sorry for not using backslashes :) haven't really used windows in the last while

> [thevideovault](#comment_1_1DfkDpkeDXGbHJ2ZT31DPvYr5xR59Jr8BA): When I follow the Linux installation instructions, running "make" gives the following error:
> pattern.c:32:10: fatal error: 'pcre.h' file not found

Did you install libprec3?
